update improve_topic set impid = #{impid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gtype = #{gtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, supertopicid = #{supertopicid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE improve_topic SET isdel = '1' WHERE businessid=#{topicid} AND impid=#{improveid} AND userid=#{userid}
